verses.roman:
tabe vārāṇasī gosāñi āilā kata-dine
śuni ānandita ha-ilā prabhura āgamane

synonyms: tabe—in this way; vārāṇasī—to Vārāṇasī; gosāñi—Sanātana Gosvāmī; āilā—came; kata-dine—after a few days; śuni—hearing; ānandita—very pleased; ha-ilā—he became; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āgamane—about the arrival.
translation: After a few days, Sanātana Gosvāmī arrived at Vārāṇasī. He was very pleased to hear about Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's arrival there.
